solution_line_template: Marcy is bringing {num_tubs} tubs of lip gloss * {tubes_per_tub} tubes of lip gloss per tub of lip gloss = <<{num_tubs}*{tubes_per_tub}={total_tubes}>>{total_tubes} tubes of lip gloss.
So she must be applying makeup to {total_tubes} tubes of lip gloss * {people_per_tube} people per tube of lip gloss = <<{total_tubes}*{people_per_tube}={total_people}>>{total_people} people.
